name: Patchman vs. Red Circles
description:
You're Patchman! Be you shouldn't be. Confused? So is Patchman, who has woken up to find the Sheeple in trouble - enslaved by Drones - and somehow Patchman is at the heart of it all!

Stay out of sight, wear clever disguises, search the forest for seeds, grow forbidden fruits and plants and power down those nasty robots! All this and more awaits in PATCHMAN VS RED CIRCLES, a sneak-and-grow action/adventure.

RED CIRCLES is the first episode of a four-part series that when all combined together makes a game called: DON'T BE PATCHMAN! Make sure not to miss out on uncovering the mystery of Patchman, as when the final clues are revealed, it will blow your entire view of the world apart!!! Seriously...
